main event: On April 22, 1966, a civilian reported a UFO sighting following a jet plane in Belchertown, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing reddish-white and dropped slowly to the ground,The sighting lasted for 17 minutes and 12 seconds,There was an indication that the object might have been observed at a speed of 1,200-1,500 mph,The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the object,The report was concluded as having insufficient data for evaluation.
